channel.title: [508] i have dragon imp looting![508]

item.title: [508] i have dragon imp looting![508]
item.dc:creator: @teh0wn_ltd teh0wn ltd
item.description:
@teh0wn_ltd wrote:

ok what to loot the d imp u need a hammer and the imp hears what i got

int[] randomItem = new int[] {4151, 11716, 9185, 592, 592, 592, 592, 592, 592, 592, 592, 592, 4087, 592, 4103, 592, 4587, 592, 592, 592, 4675, 6585}; if(itemUsed == 2347 && usedWith == 11256 || itemUsed == 11256 && usedWith == 2347) { pi.deleteItem(player, 11256, pi.getItemSlot(player, 11256), 1); player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You smash the jar, the imp pop's,and out comes a random item O.O."); pi.addItem(player, randomItem[Misc.random(randomItem.length)], 1); }
ok to add this go 2 Itemonitem.java and go down to the godsword making looks like this

if(itemUsed == 2366 && usedWith == 2368 || itemUsed == 2368 && usedWith == 2366) { pi.deleteItem(player, 2366, pi.getItemSlot(player, 2366), 1); pi.deleteItem(player, 2368, pi.getItemSlot(player, 2368), 1); pi.addItem(player, 1187, 1); } if(itemUsed == 11702 && usedWith == 11690 || itemUsed == 11690 && usedWith == 11702) { pi.deleteItem(player, 11690, pi.getItemSlot(player, 11690), 1); pi.deleteItem(player, 11702, pi.getItemSlot(player, 11702), 1); pi.addItem(player, 1187, 1); }
add it in the middle or somewhere btw the code with the imps all the id’s like 4151 and 6585 u can change 2 w/e u want
also go 2 the top and u will c this

[code]package Bulby.io.packets;

import Bulby.players.Player;
import Bulby.players.items.PlayerItems;[/code]
now add this import Bulby.util.Misc;
so it should look like this

[code]package Bulby.io.packets;

import Bulby.util.Misc;
import Bulby.players.Player;
import Bulby.players.items.PlayerItems;[/code]
and there u go looting imps
credits 10% for me for id’s and adding tut
80% davidi2 for helping me with pretty much everything
and 10% clockwise27 for telling us where the random codes where
